title: StepBOT Fitness
summary: Make your steps count with STEPBOT!
description: Make your steps count with STEPBOT!StepBOT is a fitness game that uses your steps to raise and develop pet characters that you can interact with on the go. It makes use of the steps you collect during the day, using the pedometer sensors of your Android, Android Wear or fitness tracker devices, such as FitBit and Jawbone. For Android Wear users, you can setup and manage your StepBOT character on your Android device and sync with your Android Wear device to take your StepBOT character on the go without your Android phone or tablet. With these steps, your StepBOT can make the long journey across the 8-BIT United States of America! Help your StepBOT achieve that goal by making your steps count!FEATURES• Features colorful 8-BIT style graphics!• Five StepBOT characters available: STEPBOT, ICEBEAR, NINJA PENG, CATPUCHINO, RUNNY BUNNY • Raise your StepBOT with the steps you collect with your Android, Android Wear, FitBit, or Jawbone device!• Fully compatible with Android Wear smartwatches; data sychronization of StepBOT characters occurs automatically in the background between Android and Android Wear devices.• Check and manage your StepBOT character on the go with your Android Wear watch.• Unlock achievements and compete with friends in distance via Google Play Games Service!SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS• ANDROID VERSION: Android 4.0 (Ice Cream Sandwich) and above is supported.• SCREEN DISPLAY: 320p and larger display resolutions are supported.• WEARABLES SUPPORTED: Android Wear, FitBit, Jawbone© 2015 GPOP LABS
descriptionHTML:
Make your steps count with STEPBOT!

StepBOT is a fitness game that uses your steps to raise and develop pet characters that you can interact with on the go. It makes use of the steps you collect during the day, using the pedometer sensors of your Android, Android Wear or fitness tracker devices, such as FitBit and Jawbone.

For Android Wear users, you can setup and manage your StepBOT character on your Android device and sync with your Android Wear device to take your StepBOT character on the go without your Android phone or tablet.

With these steps, your StepBOT can make the long journey across the 8-BIT United States of America! Help your StepBOT achieve that goal by making your steps count!

FEATURES
• Features colorful 8-BIT style graphics!
• Five StepBOT characters available: STEPBOT, ICEBEAR, NINJA PENG, CATPUCHINO, RUNNY BUNNY
• Raise your StepBOT with the steps you collect with your Android, Android Wear, FitBit, or Jawbone device!
• Fully compatible with Android Wear smartwatches; data sychronization of StepBOT characters occurs automatically in the background between Android and Android Wear devices.
• Check and manage your StepBOT character on the go with your Android Wear watch.
• Unlock achievements and compete with friends in distance via Google Play Games Service!

SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS
• ANDROID VERSION: Android 4.0 (Ice Cream Sandwich) and above is supported.
• SCREEN DISPLAY: 320p and larger display resolutions are supported.
• WEARABLES SUPPORTED: Android Wear, FitBit, Jawbone

© 2015 GPOP LABS
comments: I can't get it to connect to fitbit. I just get a long error message and no indication that it's being worked on. Is this app still supported? I love this idea but no one has followed through well on it yet. Please fix soon, thanks!

Great concept, but poor execution. The app crashes frequently, notifications seem to appear multiple times for the same thing, and the interface feels clunky. The "tutorial" explains very little about the game, and I had to visit the kickstarter page to get a description of the different stats. Energy drains absurdly fast, such that your bot runs out of energy if left alone for even 5 minutes. Perhaps this is part of the game design, but it doesn't make for a great experience. I love the idea of this game, but I don't enjoy the app as it exists currently.

Crashes a lot Crashes a lot, freezes up my smartwatch (moto 360 1st gen) and doesn't count my steps. I don't totally understand how to use it. Shouldn't it just be like a pedometer. I wanted the cat, it gave me the cat but then reset it when I opened it on my watch to the Android guy...
Setup is broken Seems very interesting, but the setup does not seem to be working right now. Was this abandoned?
I want to like this, that's why I supported the kickstarter campaign. But when I try to connect my fitbit I get an error page.
I really like the idea! Slightly lacking functionality wise, yet then again nice and simple. Kills ny battery sadly :/
recentChanges: * Advertising banners removed and replaced with character banners.
* FIX: Resolved an issue where FitBit login was timing out on a 404 error.
* Layout optimized for rounded Android Wear devices.
* Significant performance increase for the Android Wear version.
* Minor performance optimizations for the Android version.
* Further performance optimizations made to both the Android and Android Wear versions of StepBOT.
